reviews.text: Good souvenir shop, good prices and will even give discounts if you buy a bit more. Quality is the same with the items you buy in the museums. Nice staff as well.

I bought earrings for a present. Nice design (long shape with interrelated circles of different sizes with a stone as a drop in the bottom end) and good looking materials. But turned out to be some sort of cheap stuff, creates stain on clothing and skin. One of the stones fell for no reason.
Avoid.
A shop full of the most gorgeous, affordable and original jewellery inspired by Gaudi and Picasso.  This lady is super talented and creates timeless pieces of art to wear,  Well worth a visit
